name: Absurd
long_description:
Absurd makes AI brand and performance ads at scale. Our last video for Kalshi ("Election Day") did 1M+ views, and our videos average 300K+ organic views.

Companies like Replit, Brex, Whop, Reforge, and Micro1 use Absurd to create production-quality videos in 72 hours. We do it with a multi-agent orchestration layer, working closely with your team from concept to final cut.

Try it at absurd.com

We're hiring: absurd.com/careers
one_liner: AI Brand and Performance Ads at Scale
